body_html: Indeed, the table of contents basically implements this feature. This issue remains a minor feature request that the headers which are already linkable via the table of contents should be wrapped in anchor elements to make them clickable. This is sometimes implemented by displaying a chain/link symbol 🔗 on the MouseOver event (e.g. in the PyTorch docs). That saves the step of scanning the table of contents for the particular section that one wants to link to.
